attributes.action: Limit Estate Agents ability to use hand delivered direct mail for advertising.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A large part of the hand delivered junk mail I receive in the post comes from Estate agents. This is environmentally unfriendly and unnecessary. 
As estate agents have offices and internet websites there is no need for them to advertise in this way.

I ask the PM to set limits to how much hand delivered direct mail an estate agent can send in any one year. This should also incorporate an opt out clause for people who do not want to receive anything.
